document_data.mainbody:
omecoming is a series of novels by R.A. Salvatore featuring Drizzt DoUrden and the reborn Companions of the Hall. The series follows the Companions Codex and is followed by the Generations trilogy. 
# Archmage (September 1, 2015)[http//www.amazon.com/Archmage-R-A-Salvatore/dp/0786965754 Amazon.com]
# Maestro (April 5, 2016)[http//amazon.com/Maestro-Homecoming-R-A-Salvatore/dp/0786965916 Amazon.com]
# Hero (October 25th, 2016)
CategoryNovel series
